name: Abahub Adjustable Kayak Paddle 210-230 cm/ 230-250 cm Floating Kayaking Oars Boating Oars Canoeing Oars Black
short_description: 【FAMILY FRIENDLY PADDLE】The Adjustable Paddle Family Friendly is the ultimate solution for those looking for a versatile and inclusive watercraft experience. Measuring between 210-230 centimeters (82.5-90.5 inches), this paddle is designed to accommodate people of various heights. Its adjustable feature ensures that everyone in your family can enjoy the water without any limitations. Get yours today and create lasting memories with your loved ones while having fun in the water!

【TRAVELABLE AND CONVENIENT】The detachable paddle is a great choice for travelers. This three-piece paddle is suitable for various kayaking and can be easily carried in your bag. It allows you to explore distant places without any hassle, giving you the freedom to kayaking wherever you want. With this paddle, you can now enjoy your kayaking trips with ease and comfort. So, if you are planning to kayaking or boating far away from home, make sure to bring along this portable and convenient paddle.

【FEATHERED BLADES】Feathered blades are designed with an offset angle between each other, typically ranging from 60 degrees. This unique design reduces wind resistance on the blade that is out of the water, resulting in higher efficiency. By minimizing the drag caused by air flow across the surface of the blade, feathered blades enable boats to move through the water with greater ease and speed. The feathering also helps to improve the overall stability and control of the vessel.

【LIGHTWEIGHT AND DURABLE 】The aluminum alloy shaft is known for its strength and ability to withstand the wear and tear of frequent use. In addition to its durability, the aluminum alloy shaft also offers better performance and more efficient paddling. PP blades are lightweight and indestructible blades offer flexibility and efficiency, making it easier for paddlers to navigate through the water with ease.

【EFFICIENCY AND PERFORMANCE】An asymmetrical blade is characterized by a relatively narrow and shorter on one side. The surface area of the asymmetrical blade remains more uniform as it moves through the water. This design allows for efficient and effective cutting through the water.
